name: Ahmed Ali
text: TA HA.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have not sent down the Qur'an to you that you should be burdened,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But as admonition for him who fears --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: A revelation from Him who created the earth and the high ascending skies,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The ever-merciful, established on the throne (of authority).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whatever is in the heavens and the earth and in between them, belongs to Him, as whatever lies under the earth.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whether you say a thing aloud or inaudibly, He has knowledge of the secret and the hidden.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: God: There is no god but He. To Him belong the attributes most beautiful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Has the story of Moses come to you?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he saw a fire he said to his family: "You wait here. I have seen a fire. I may haply be able to bring an ember from it, or find direction by the fire."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he approached it, a voice called out:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "O Moses, I am verily your Lord, so take off your shoes, for you are in the holy plain of Towa.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I am God, and there is no god but I, so serve Me, and observe acts of prayer to remember Me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily the Hour (of the great change) is about to come. I keep it secret that every soul may be rewarded for its endeavour.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So do not let those who do not believe in it and follow their vain desires, turn you away from it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: What is that in your right band, O Moses?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "It's my staff," he answered; "I lean on it, and fell leaves for my goats with it, and I have other uses for it."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Throw it down, O Moses," said (the Voice).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So he threw it down, and lo, it became a running serpent.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Catch it," said He, "and have no fear; We shall revert it to its former state.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And face what is to come with patience, your hand will not be tarnished with blame: Another sign

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That We may go on showing you Our greater signs.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Go to the Pharaoh as he has become exceedingly rebellious."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Moses said: "O my Lord, enlarge my breast,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And make my mission easy.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Remove the defect of my tongue

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That they may understand my speech,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And give me as assistant from my family

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Aaron my brother

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To strengthen me

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And share my task,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That we may sing Your praises much,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And remember you a great deal.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely You know us well."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He answered: "Granted is your prayer, O Moses.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have bestowed Our favour on you before this

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When We told your mother what We relate:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: 'Put him in a wooden box and cast it in the river. The river will cast it on the bank. An enemy of Ours, and his, will retrieve it.' We bestowed Our love on you that you may be reared under Our eyes.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then your sister followed you, and said (to the people who had retrieved the child): 'Should I guide you to a person who can nurse him?' We thus brought you back to your mother that her heart may be cheered, and she may not grieve. (Remember) when you killed a man We saved you from anguish; and tested and steeled you (in other ways). Afterwards you sojourned for several years with the people of Midian; then you came up to the measure,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And I chose you for Myself.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Go with My signs, you and your brother, and do not be lax in remembering Me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then go to the Pharaoh as he has become exceedingly rebellious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Speak to him gently. He may possibly take heed or may come to have fear."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "O our Lord, we are really frightened lest he behave insolently with us or become violent."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Lord) said: "Be not afraid. I am verily with you, and I hear and see.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So go to him and say: 'The two of us have indeed been sent by your Lord. So let the children of Israel come with us, and do not oppress them. We have come to you with a token from your Lord. Peace on him who follows the way of guidance.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It has been revealed to us that punishment will befall him who denies and turns away.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He asked: "Who then is that Lord of yours, O Moses?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Our Lord is He who gave everything its natural form and directed it."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said: "And what about the former generations?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) replied: "Knowledge of that is with my Lord (recorded) in the Book. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is He who made the earth a bed for you, and traced for you paths upon it, and sends down water from the sky, and brings out through it every kind of vegetation

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To eat and feed your cattle. Surely there are signs in these for those who are wise.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We created you from the earth and will revert you back to it; and raise you up from it a second time.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We showed him all Our signs, but he denied them and refused,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And said: "Have you come to us, O Moses, to drive us out of our land with your witchery?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We shall certainly meet you with like magic. So make an appointment when we and you could meet on common ground, which neither we nor you should fail to keep."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Said (Moses): "Let your meeting be on the day of the Feast, and let people assemble in broad daylight."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: After this the Pharaoh withdrew and settled his stratagem, then came back.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Moses said to them: "Woe betide you. Do not fabricate a lie against God, or He will destroy you with some affliction. For he who fabricates lies is doomed to failure."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So they discussed their strategy among themselves and conferred privately,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And) said: "These two are surely magicians. They want to deprive you of your land with their magic, and eradicate your distinct way (of life).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So prepare your strategy and come forward. He alone shall win today who is superior."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Either you cast (your spell), O Moses, or we shall cast it first."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Moses said: "No. You cast it first" Then it seemed to Moses that by their magic their cords and rods were flying;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And Moses felt afraid within himself.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We said to him: "Fear not. You will certainly be victorious.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Throw down what is in your right hand: It will swallow up what they have conjured. For what they have fashioned is only a trick of the sorcerer; and a sorcerer does not succeed wherever he may come."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The magicians, (seeing the miracle), fell down in prostration, saying: "We believe in the Lord of Moses and Aaron."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said: "You have come to believe without my dispensation. Surely he is your chief who taught you magic. I will have your hands and feet cut off on alternate sides and crucify you on the trunks of date-palm trees. You will come to know whose punishment is harder and protracted."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They replied: "We cannot choose you in the face of the clear testimony we have received, and over Him who created us. So do what you are determined to do. All that you would do will only be confined to our life on earth.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have certainly come to believe in our Lord that He may forgive our trespasses and the magic you have forced us to perform, for God is nobler and abiding."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely for him who comes before his Lord a sinner shall be Hell, where he will neither die nor live.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But whoever comes before Him a believer having done good deeds, will be raised to higher stations --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Gardens of Eden with rippling streams, where he will live for ever. This is the recompense of those who achieve integrity.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We commanded Moses: "Journey by night with Our creatures, and strike a dry path for them through the sea. Do not fear being overtaken, nor have dread of any thing."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then the Pharaoh followed them with his army, but the sea overpowered and engulfed them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The Pharaoh had led his people astray, and did not rightly guide them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: O children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and made a covenant with you on the right side of the Mount, and sent down for you manna and quails,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And said): "Eat of the good things We have given you for food, and do not exceed the bounds (of law) in this, or My wrath will surely fall upon you; and he who incurs My wrath will fall into the abyss.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet I am gracious to him who repents and believes, and does the right, and follows the straight path.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: What made you hurry away, O Moses, from your people?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "They are right behind me. I have hastened to You, O Lord, so that You may be pleased."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "We have put your people on trial in your absence; and Sameri has led them astray."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So Moses returned to his people full of anger and regret. "O my people," he said, "did not your Lord make you a better promise? Did the time of covenant seem too long to you? Or did you wish the wrath of your Lord to fall upon you that you broke the promise you had made to me?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "We did not break our promise to you of our own will, but we were made to carry the loads of ornaments belonging to the people, which we threw (into the fire), and so did Sameri.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then he produced the image of a calf which mooed like a cow. And they said: 'This is your god and the god of Moses (whom) he has neglected."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Did they not see that it did not give them any answer, nor had it power to do them harm or bring them gain?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Aaron had indeed told them earlier: "O my people, you are being only misled with this. Surely your Lord is Ar-Rahman. So follow me and obey my command."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said "So long as Moses does not come back we are not going to give it up, and we will remain devoted to it."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But (Moses) said: "O Aaron, when you saw that they had gone astray, what hindered you

name: Ahmed Ali
text: From coming after me? Did you not disobey my command?" (And Moses pulled him by the hair).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "O son of my mother," (Aaron cried), do not pull me by my beard or my hair! I was really afraid you may say that I had created a rift among the children of Israel, and did not pay heed to your command."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Moses asked: "O Sameri, what was the matter?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "I saw what they did not see. I picked up a handful of dust from the messenger's tracks and threw it in, for the idea seemed attractive to me."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Go hence! All your life you are (cursed) to say: 'Do not touch me; and a threat hangs over you which you will not be able to escape. Look at your god to whom you are so attached: We shall verily burn it, and disperse its ashes into the sea.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Your god is only God. There is no other god but He. His knowledge extends over everything."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Thus do We narrate some account to you of what has gone before, and We have truly given you a Reminder of Our own.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whoever turns away from it will surely carry a burden on the Day of Judgement,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And will live for ever under it. How evil the burden they will carry on the Day of Doom!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The day the trumpet blast is sounded We shall raise the sinners blind,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whispering to one another: "You have tarried but ten days."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We know well what they will say when the most upright among them will say: "You did not tarry more than a day."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will ask you about the mountains. Tell them: "My Lord will uproot them from the base,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And turn them into a level plain,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Over which you will see no curves or elevations.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That day they will follow the summoner from whom there will be no receding; and their voices will be hushed before Ar-Rahman, and you will not hear a sound but faint shuffling.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: On that day no intercession will matter other than his whom Ar-Rahman grants permission and accepts.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He knows what is before them and hidden from them, but they cannot grasp it with their knowledge.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: All heads will be bowed before the Living, the Eternal; and whosoever bears a load of iniquity will be full of despair.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But he who has done good things and believes, will have no fear of either being wronged or deprived.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That is why We have sent it down as an eloquent Qur'an, and explained in different ways the intimidations through it that they may haply take heed, or perhaps it may lead them to contemplate.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Exalted then be God, the real King; and do not try to anticipate the Qur'an before the completion of its revelation, but pray: "O Lord, give me greater knowledge."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We had commanded Adam before, but he disregarded it: We found him lacking in resolution.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When We said to the angels: ''Bow before Adam,'' they all bowed but Iblis, who refused.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We said; "O Adam, he is truly your enemy and your wife's. Do not let him have you turned out of Paradise and come to grief.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily you will have no hunger or nakedness there,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Nor thirst nor exposure to the sun."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But then Satan tempted him by saying: "O Adam, should I show you the tree of immortality, and a kingdom that will never know any wane?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And both ate of (its fruit), and their hidden parts were exposed to one another, and they patched the leaves of the garden (to hide them). Adam disobeyed his Lord, and went astray.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then his Lord chose him and relented towards him, and showed him the way;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And) said: "Go down hence together, one the enemy of the other. Then will guidance come to you from Me; and whoever follows My direction will neither be disgraced nor be miserable.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But he who fails to heed My warning will have his means restricted; and on the Day of Resurrection We shall raise him blind."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He will ask: "O Lord, why have you raised me blind when I was able to see?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (God) will say: "Because Our signs came to you, but you disregarded them. So shall We disregard you this day."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And that is how We requite him who is extravagant and does not believe the signs of his Lord; and surely the punishment of the Hereafter is far more severe and persistent.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Did they not learn from the many generations that We destroyed before them, whose habitations they now frequent? Verily there are signs in this for men of understanding.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If the decree (of respite) had not been pronounced by your Lord, (the inevitable judgement would have ensued); but a term is fixed (for everything).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So you bear with patience what they say, and sing the praises of your Lord before the rising and setting of the sun, and honour Him in the watches of the night, and then at the two ends of day, that you may find acceptance.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do not covet what We have granted myriads of people of the pomp and glitter of this world to tempt them. The means your Lord has given you are better far and more enduring.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Enjoin on your people service to God, and be yourself constant in it. We do not ask you to provide: It is We who provide for you. The reward is for piety and fear of God.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet they say: "Why does he not bring a sign from his Lord?" Have not clear proofs come to them in what is contained in the earlier Books?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If We had destroyed them by some calamity sooner than this, they would have surely said: "O Lord, if You had sent to us a messenger we would have followed Your command before being humbled and disgraced."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "Each one awaits the consequence; so you wait. You will come to know soon who are the men of the straight path and who have come to guidance.
